message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
You can have less, I'll get more!
I'll give you a bit more, but I'm not giving up too much
I'll take more, but you'll get less, it's still a good deal!
I'll give you a bit more, but I'm not giving up too much more
You're getting desperate, I'm getting greedy!
I'll give you a bit more, but I'm not giving up completely
I'm getting impatient, take it or leave it!
I'll give you a bit more, but I'm running out of options
Last chance, take the deal or we both lose!
